desc: Online shopping at Stringswingsthings.com. South African locally manufactured, home grown. In Stock Now. Easy and Secure Ways to Pay Fast, Reliable Nationwide Delivery. Delivered to your Home. functional consumer products, antimicrobial copper keys, birch ply workstations, convenient and efficient.

layout.text: Welcome to our showroom - a tactile think-tank and extension of Project Room, our commercial business working with brands, corporate customers and interior designers providing a retail channel directly to you. Our approach allows you to curate and customise products in our catalogue, from our initial signature handwoven wooden framed swings, to an extended range of string furniture.
